hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: REPO_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the freedom-tools repo to use

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: WIPEOUT_FILES
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Delete build files on build server

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: EXTRA_OPTION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Extra text to control a build
